title: got lots to trade for t206 white sox
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: got lots to trade for t206 white sox
posts.post_content:

T206

Too many to name send me an email!

too many send me an email!

Hi Sean:  We've traded in the past I think.

Need an Atz?  I have one in VG or thereabouts.

Here's my current list of T206 needs.......

Chuck
